basics.name: Jason Chuong
basics.label: Data / DevOps/ Cloud Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced professional with 20+ years of hands-on expertise in complex cloud infrastructure implementation and maintenance. Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with teams to develop innovative technologies under tight time constraints, while maintaining excellent judgment in fast-paced environments.

certifications.title: Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect

references.reference: I worked with Jason for 9 years at CNET/CBS Interactive with several years on the same team. Jason is a solid, versatile and inventive senior engineer with deep systems knowledge on Linux and Windows and strong data architecture skills on MySQL, SQL Server and NoSQL. A great team player, he was always ready to help, and with his hands-on attitude and ability to keep up-to-date with both new and in-use technologies, he was often our go-to person for systems and database questions. If I ever start a company, Jason would be my first call as the 'data guy'.
references.name: Tushar Pradhan, Principal Software Engineer, Localytics

references.reference: Jason is an excellent technology partner, collaborator and team member. I had the pleasure of working with Jason regularly at CBS Interactive across numerous sites and projects. Jason is extremely proactive, knowledgable and constantly improving his skills and staying on top of the latest advances and trends, particularly around data management and systems engineering.
references.name: Chris McCooey, Principal Consultant

references.reference: I worked with Jason on a variety of projects over a period of 6 years. It was the best part of my CBS career, as it was exciting to work with a strong team. Jason showed a keen sense of originality, communication and knowledge of databases. He was often ready to take up interesting challenges, and come up with innovative approaches to solve them from the perspective of performance, scalability, reliability and ease of use. Jason is very versatile, hands-on and knows a variety of different scripting and programming languages, and sql too. Most of all he is very strong in Mysql and other open source technologies. When Nosql hit the street, I saw Jason was one of the first people in my organization to pick it up. He showed great foresight and keenness in delivering the technical skills needed to solve the problem right when it needs to be solved. I also observed over the years, that he has grown his network of technical expertise by cross-collaborating with a variety of different teams. He is a confident and strong data modeling expert, who has the expertise to deal with a diverse variety of data. If I have the chance, I would love to work with him.
references.name: Manoj Joshi, Vice President of Software Engineer

work.summary: Managing and providing support for multiple data platforms in a dynamic environment with appropriate planning and implementation strategies such as establishing standardized processes, automating tasks wherever possible, and continuously monitoring and optimizing performance.

Collaborated with CMS team on improve and redesign of an event-driven cms based on Google Cloud Services

work.summary: As a lead engineer for cloud migration, my role involves supervising the planning and execution of the IT infrastructure and application migration from colocation to Google Cloud.
